hibernate-mapping.sql-query: SELECT e.idEmployee as empId, concat(e.LastName, "," , e.FirstName) as empName, p.Name as projName, ROUND(DATEDIFF(NOW(),e.JoiningDate)/365, 1) as tcsExp, ROUND(DATEDIFF(NOW(),e.JobStartDate)/365, 1) as overalExp FROM dashboardapp.temployee e JOIN dashboardapp.rproject p on e.idProject = p.idTProject

SELECT COUNT(s.conductedby) noOfTraining, ROUND(DATEDIFF(NOW(),e.JobStartDate)/365, 1) experience FROM dashboardapp.temployee e JOIN dashboardapp.ttrainingschedule s on e.idEmployee = s.conductedby JOIN dashboardapp.rtraining t on s.idTraining = t.idTTraining group by experience >15 having experience >15

SELECT COUNT(s.conductedby) noOfTraining, ROUND(DATEDIFF(NOW(),e.JobStartDate)/365, 1) experience FROM dashboardapp.temployee e JOIN dashboardapp.ttrainingschedule s on e.idEmployee = s.conductedby JOIN dashboardapp.rtraining t on s.idTraining = t.idTTraining group by experience BETWEEN 10 AND 15 having experience BETWEEN 10 AND 15

SELECT COUNT(s.conductedby) noOfTraining, ROUND(DATEDIFF(NOW(),e.JobStartDate)/365, 1) experience FROM dashboardapp.temployee e JOIN dashboardapp.ttrainingschedule s on e.idEmployee = s.conductedby JOIN dashboardapp.rtraining t on s.idTraining = t.idTTraining group by experience BETWEEN 5 AND 10 having experience BETWEEN 5 AND 10

SELECT COUNT(s.conductedby) noOfTraining, ROUND(DATEDIFF(NOW(),e.JobStartDate)/365, 1) experience FROM dashboardapp.temployee e JOIN dashboardapp.ttrainingschedule s on e.idEmployee = s.conductedby JOIN dashboardapp.rtraining t on s.idTraining = t.idTTraining group by experience <5 having experience <5
select t.Name, s.StartDate, s.EndDate FROM dashboardapp.temployee e JOIN dashboardapp.ttrainingschedule s on e.idEmployee = s.conductedby JOIN dashboardapp.rtraining t on s.idTraining = t.idTTraining
